description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lmsl","text":"This protocol describes the immunolabelling of one or several protein targets on PFA-fixed cell culture on glass coverslips. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"2jiqb","text":"Adherent cells are prone to peeling, and hence, addition and removal of any liquid should be performed slowly with care.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"693qf","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36gee","text":"At no point during the entire procedure prior to mounting should the sample be left to dry. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"680si","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qd16","text":"Fluorescent-dye conjugated Secondary Antibodies are light-sensitive and hence should always be protected from light.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgnfc","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94f5v","text":"All PBS washes should be at least 10 mins, and plates are left to incubate on the bench at room temperature.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Do, Q. B. et al. (2023) Early striatal hyperexcitability in an in vitro human striatal microcircuit model carrying the Parkinson’s GBA-N370S mutation

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bi4cc","text":"Prepare glass coverslips and plates for replating","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"els1d","text":"Transfer glass coverslips cultured with MSNs matured to relevant experimental timepoints into a 6-well plate.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98dsl","text":"Draw a fitting circle enclosing the entire coverslip with a hydrophobic Pap pen. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4t7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4up7c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5us0e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbn5h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cs15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"857q0","text":"This circle serves as a boundary to contain the fluid volume applied onto the cell coverslip.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":13,"offset":70,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":99,"style":"bold"}],"key":"106j4","text":"If performing immunocytochemistry on plastic well-cultured MSNs, omit steps 4 and 5 and proceed to step 6 onwards.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gu0j","text":"Fix cells by adding 2% PFA in PBS to each well at room temperature for 20 mins.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9rnnu","text":"Remove PFA completely using a pipette.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dokgq","text":"Wash thoroughly 3 times with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hbb7","text":"Incubate the coverslips in PBS for at least 1 hour at room temperature or at 4°C overnight.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vpua","text":"Perform antigen retrieval by adding 50 mL of 1x citrate buffer (pH 6.0) to each well, and place the 6-well plate in a water bath at 80ºC for 5 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lhqg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a8au","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4m3j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c1kts","text":"Fluid can quickly dried out during the incubation - a generous amount of citrate buffer should be added. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"atg0r","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":46,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6narb","text":"This step is time- and temperature-sensitive. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ami1m","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"252qo","text":"Longer incubation and/or higher temperature can damage the cell sample. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c9i6i","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 10-20 mins.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5795","text":"Prepare blocking solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS) and 0.1% Triton-X during the post-antigen retrieval incubation.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"79fl0","text":"Remove the citrate buffer and add 50 mL of blocking solution.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1hs6c","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 10 mins.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f152s","text":"Wash twice with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91vgp","text":"During the previous washes, prepare the Primary Antibody Solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS), supplemented with appropriate primary antibodies in their respective working concentrations.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5fhpq","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"nfdl","text":"The following primary antibodies (working concentration 1:250) were used in Do, Q. et al. (2023) for immunostaining: anti-CTIP2, anti-DARPP32, anti-DARPP32, GAD67, anti-MAP2, anti-Calbindin, PDYN, PKEN, Substance P, Tyrosine hydroxylase.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f80bt","text":"Remove all the PBS from each well and add 80 mL of the Primary Antibody Solution.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8knpu","text":"Leave to incubate overnight at 4°C.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"95v1a","text":"Remove all the Primary Antibody Solution and add fresh PBS.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2q0ok","text":"Wash thoroughly 3 times with PBS, at least 10 mins each.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba14g","text":"During the last wash, prepare Secondary Antibody Solution containing PBS with 10% Donkey Bovine Serum (NBS), supplemented with appropriate secondary antibodies and DAPI (4',6-Diamidino-2-Phenylindole, Dilactate) in their respective working concentrations. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bpbtm","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6dv71","text":"The following secondary antibodies (working concentration 1:1000) were used in Do, Q. et al. (2023) for immunostaining: Alexa-Fluor 555 Mouse and Rabbit, Alexa-Fluor 648 Rabbit, Alexa Fluor 488 Rat and Chicken, and DAPI. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4j769","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"10ota","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"497dv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d19fm","text":"Keep pre-made solution wrapped in aluminium foil and/or keep away from direct light during incubation.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fupic","text":"Remove all the PBS from each well and add 80 mL of the Secondary Antibody Solution.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8e4uv","text":"Leave to incubate at room temperature for 1-2 hours.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r953","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg2p4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fn02k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6ghj5","text":"Keep cell plates wrapped in aluminium foil and/or keep away from direct light during incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tcu7","text":"Once done, wash well with PBS.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4g7k","text":"Wrap culture plates with aluminium foil and/or keep away from direct light.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"636hj","text":"Keep immunostained well plates in PBS plus 0.02% Azide for long-term storage.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fpl56","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"35v7m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6r7ar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":49,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1a76i","text":"Samples can be mounted immediately after washes (step 22) without PBS storage, if imaging is to be done within the next 48-72 hours. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akdug","text":"Keep immunostained coverslips in PBS till 24 hours prior to imaging date.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5no3l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edpnq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ohgh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":59,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1mpqm","text":"Regularly add extra PBS to protect samples from drying out.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c37q","text":"At least 24 hours prior to the recording, apply a small drop of SlowFade Diamond Antifade mountant onto each coverslip, and carefully place the coverslip on the glass slides.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hhvl","text":"Leave to incubate the mounted slides at 4°C overnight.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"927qr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blrfu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9u37b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2ns64","text":"Proceed with imaging within 2 weeks after completing the protocol. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2m57g","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":57,"offset":80,"style":"bold"}],"key":"22u5c","text":"SlowFade Diamond Antifade mountant is non-hard setting mountant, and therefore, prolonged storage of the mounted sample is not desirable. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dkss1","text":"Add 10 or 100 μg/mL of Poly-D-lysine onto plastic wells and glass coverslips, respectively and incubate at 37⁰C overnight.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epe08","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"92e9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1ibg4","text":"These glass coverslips should have been sterilised in 70% ethanol for at least 1 hour and air dried completely in a tissue culture hood.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d90m9","text":"Wash plenty with Phosphate-buffered Saline (PBS), at least 3 times.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"94i88","text":"Add Matrigel and incubate at 37⁰C for at least 1 hour.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3b6s","text":"Prepare media for thawing and replating","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"328mk","text":"Pre-warm spinning falcons containing 9 mL of Neurobasal. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9mn1g","text":"Prepare Day 16 (D16) media + ROCKi (1:1000). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8pngm","text":"Allow an aliquot of desired volume to reach room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvbp5","text":"Thawing and replating of Day 16 Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) precursors","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57h1k","text":"Thaw cryovial containing Day 16 MSN precursors in water bath until only a small component remains frozen.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57otr","text":"Carefully transfer contents of cryovial to pre-warmed spinning tubes. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e3s5k","text":"Centrifuge at 350g for 5 min.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"hh9o","text":"While spinning, aspirate Matrigel and replace with D16 media + ROCKi (1:1000). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8pg9t","text":"Aspirate media from cell pellet in spinning falcon and replace with D16 media + ROCKi (1:1000), slowly and gently resuspending the pellet. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6lmag","text":"Transfer an appropriate amount of cell suspension into previously prepared glass coverslips and swirl plate gently in a figure 8 motion. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Replating human Medium Spiny Neurons (MSNs) onto glass coverslips
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"doocv","text":"Allow cells to be cultured on glass coverslips as described in step 5 of Protocol:  Differentiation of human medium spiny neurons (MSNs) from induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) until relevant experimental timepoints for immunocytochemistry. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":107}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":107}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7C5D1250B38511ED98D90F4658C756B8","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/3B9BC4A3A665434603C1A856313CDCA1"}}}}
